DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Identify specific molecular function Fanconi anemia ( FA ) complement gene product hematopoietic progenitor cell patient normal volunteer . - Identify functional defect hematopoietic stromal cell , include macrophage , patient FA , select blood cancer well normal volunteer . OUTLINE : Peripheral blood mononuclear leukocytes , skin fibroblast , marrow fibroblast collect loss-of-function gain-of-function analysis relate Fanconi anemia complement gene .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Meets 1 follow criterion : Diagnosis one following : Fanconi 's anemia require bone marrow biopsy part standard care ( adults child ) Myeloproliferative disorder myeloma ( adult ) Healthy volunteer , meet 1 follow criterion : Over 18 year age Bone marrow transplant donor ( child ) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Hemoglobin > 13 g/dL White blood cell ( WBC ) > 4,000/mm³ Platelet count > 150,000/mm³ No clinical sign symptom acute subacute infection ( viral , bacterial , fungal ) No know blood abnormality ( healthy volunteer ) No allergy lidocaine xylocaine PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
